title: Executive Order 11340-Effective Date of Department of Transportation Act
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States by Section 15 of the Department of Transportation Act (Public Law 89-670, approved October 15, 1966; 80 Stat. 950) April 1, 1967, is hereby prescribed as the date on which the Department of Transportation Act shall take effect.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11340-Effective Date of Department of Transportation Act Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306339
